subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: It took less than two minutes into Saturday night’s game for the first fight, between the Rangers’ Colton Orr and the Flyers’ Riley Cote, before the Rangers went on to win.
snippet: It took less than two minutes into Saturday night’s game for the first fight, between the Rangers’ Colton Orr and the Flyers’ Riley Cote, before the Rangers went on to win.
